description: Modifies the default instance metadata service (IMDS) settings at the account level in the specified Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: HttpTokens
parameters.description: Indicates whether IMDSv2 is required. optional --- IMDSv2 is optional, which means that you can use either IMDSv2 or IMDSv1. required --- IMDSv2 is required, which means that IMDSv1 is disabled, and you must use IMDSv2.

parameters.name: HttpPutResponseHopLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of hops that the metadata token can travel. To indicate no preference, specify -1. Possible values: Integers from 1 to 64, and -1 to indicate no preference.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: If the request succeeds, the response returns true. If the request fails, no response is returned, and instead an error message is returned.
